name: Sticky Throws
description:
Tricky throws!

Exciting action puzzler about throwing items and sticking them together.

Controls: Mouse aim, hold right click to charge and let go to throw

When items stick together you get points. More items are stuck together more points. Do trick shots from walls for double the points!

If you throw item and it doesn't stick before disappearing you lose a live.

Should be runnable by non-linux machines and on browser, but didn't have time to bundle.

Repository: https://github.com/WaDelma/sticky-throws

Credits: Delma for code and art, VoxWave for music
